name: Get Ghost!
summary:
Meet Ghost, the biggest menace to hit Stunt City after the Big Quake.
Ride with him and his misfit friends. Break all the speed limits and get to visit all of Stunt City while being chased by the entire police force.
Get Ghost! is the next generation running game! You can jump, duck, rocket jump, glide, fly planes, climb on cars, ride clouds, jump on roofs and pass through buildings.
